description:
Bring a little comfort to those white knuckled moments. With their wide ergonomic design, the GA2 let you relax your hands on chill sections, while offering a comfortable connection when things get techie.

  • Supple but not too soft, UV-resistant rubber absorbs vibration
  • Textured cutouts rotate against your natural grip, increasing your connection
  • Conical taper encourages proper hand placement
  • Single lockring for easy installation
  • Lasered indicators on the lockring help you dial in your cockpit
name: Ergon GA2 Grips
